statements: UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', recipe_description = 'A classic Italian pasta dish.', recipe_image = 'image_data' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_description = 'Simple and easy to make.', recipe_image = 'image_data', recipe_name = 'Chicken Alfredo' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'New Recipe 1', recipe_description = 'Updated description for Recipe 1' WHERE recipe_id = 1;

UPDATE recipes SET recipe_description = 'This is a new description for Recipe 2', recipe_image = '\x89504E470D0A1A0A0000000D49484452000000280000002A0806000000374F9FA9000000017352474200AECE1CE90000000A4944415478DAEDD8010D0A94FCDFCD0503210D84EE97DB5E968D0F20000000049454E44AE426082';
UPDATE recipe_images SET image_description = 'Delicious dish image' WHERE image_url = 'https://example.com/dish_image.jpg'
UPDATE recipe_details SET instructions = 'Mix all ingredients and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.' WHERE recipe_id = 101
UPDATE recipe_images SET image_description = 'Delicious pizza' WHERE recipe_id = 1;

UPDATE recipe_details SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', cooking_time = 30, ingredients = ARRAY['spaghetti', 'eggs', 'pancetta', 'parmesan cheese'], instructions = '1. Cook spaghetti.
2. Whip eggs.
3. Fry pancetta.
4. Mix all ingredients together.' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Pasta Salad' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET ingredient_quantity = 2.5, ingredient_unit = 'cups' WHERE ingredient_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_description = 'A delicious and healthy recipe' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET ingredient_quantity = 2.5, ingredient_unit = 'cups' WHERE ingredient_name = 'Flour';
UPDATE RecipeImages SET chef_name = 'John Smith', recipe_name = 'Pasta Carbonara' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE RecipeSteps SET step_description = 'Mix all ingredients in a bowl' WHERE step_id = 2;
UPDATE RecipeImages SET chef_name = 'John Doe', image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE RecipeIngredients SET ingredient_name = 'Salt' WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredients SET ingredient_quantity = 2.5 WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET recipe_name = 'New Recipe Name' WHERE recipe_id = 1
UPDATE ingredients SET ingredient_quantity = 2.5 WHERE ingredient_id = 3
